issues.description: The problem statement refers to a static method named `acceptSupplyDelivery` (lines 69 and 71 in problem_statement.md) and even names the test `testAcceptSupplyDelivery()`, but the UML diagram (line 30) and the solution implementation (SealSaloon.java) define the method as `receiveDelivery`. This inconsistency will confuse students about which method name to implement and how the tests will locate it.
issues.suggested_fix: Choose one consistent method name. Either rename `receiveDelivery` in the UML and solution to `acceptSupplyDelivery`, or update all references in the problem statement (including test names) to use `receiveDelivery`.
